title: Sleep for health
brief_description: Presents the importance of regular sleeping habits from the viewpoint of a child. Shows the child how a regular bed-time which allows for sufficient sleep helps them attain goals which they desire. Emphasises the child’s own responsibility in the formation of good habits. Considers dreaming as a normal part of sleeping. Illustrates how lack of sleep causes irritability and interferes with the enjoyment of everyday living.
